name: The Egg of Light
description:
This is my take on the WGJ 45 theme "Hatch an Egg".

I wanted to try out lights/shadow and AI implementation.

Here came The Egg of Light. 

The goal is for the player to use the powers of the Egg to solve puzzles and avoid enemies to reach the end of each level.

Part of the story is there now! The rest depends on your imagination, hope you'll like it! :)

Still in development, but "playable.
